title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 8.5 - Designation as representative office
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 8.5 - Designation as representative office

State Regulations

Any representative office subject to registration pursuant
to this Supervisory Policy shall designate itself as a representative office on
any office sign at its office location, telephone listing, print advertisement
and on its stationery. It shall also prominently display a notice at its office
location that it is not a branch office of a bank and does not engage in
general banking transactions at such office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
8.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
